alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 8:33PM CDT until August 02 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Bayfield County in northwestern Wisconsin... Northwestern Sawyer County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 832 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Cable, or 15 miles north of Hayward, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cable, Seeley and Round Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
